data.title: English
data.text:
We should be ashamed of ourselves

The United Nations' (UN) highest court has ordered Israel to immediately halt its military assault on the city of Rafah. This decision comes amidst international reactions to Israel's operations in Gaza. In parallel with these developments, renowned rock star Paul Weller has sharply criticized Israel's ongoing attacks on Gaza.

"Withdraw your investment for free Palestine"

Demonstrations in support of Philistine at universities around the world are affecting graduation ceremonies in the United States, but they are also spreading in universities in Europe.

On the Month of Ramadan / SECOND POINT - THIRD POINT - FOURTH POINT

One of the many instances of wisdom in the fast of the blessed month of Ramadan with respect to thankfulness for God Almighty's bounties is as follows:

We congratulate your Laylatul Qadr

The Night of Glory is better than a thousand months. That night the angels and the holy spirit descend, by the permission of their Lord, for every decreed matter. It is all peace until the break of dawn (Surah Al-Qadr, 3-5)

On the Month of Ramadan / FIRST POINT

[There having been a brief discussion of 'the marks of Islam' at the end of the First Section, the most brilliant and splendid of the marks, Ramadan the Noble, is discussed in this Second Section. This Section consists of Nine Points, which explain nine of the numerous instances of wisdom in the month of Ramadan.]

We congratulate your Laylat al-Mi'raj

We congratulate your Laylat al-Mi'raj, desirous that Allah (swt) will grant you the honour of intercession of our Prophet Muhammad (pbuh) who was sent as a mercy to the universe.

We congratulate your Laylat al-Raghaib

We congratulate your Laylat al-Raghaib, desirous that Allah (swt) will grant you the honour of intercession of our Prophet Muhammad (pbuh) who was sent as a mercy to the universe.

We congratulate your Mawlid al-Nabi

We congratulate your Mawlid al-Sharif, desirous that Allah (swt) will grant you the honour of intercession of our Prophet Muhammad (pbuh) who was sent as a mercy to the universe.

Examining healing houses in Turkey, the US Dr. Awaad: Islamic civilization had a beautiful healing heritage

The US psychiatrist, who works on Islamic sciences and psychology, Dr. Rania Awaad, "Psychology studies are part of the heritage of Muslims. Islamic civilization had a beautiful healing heritage and you see it with healing houses." said.

Sinead O'Connor (Şüheda Davitt) has died at the age of 56

The famous Irish female singer known as Sinead O'Connor, who took the name Şüheda Davitt after announcing that she was a Muslim, has died at the age of 56.

“When I prostrated for the first time, I couldn't burst my tears”

Babic, who is of Russian origin, stated that she still feels the excitement of the Feast of Ramadan in the depths of her heart, even though it has been eight years since she became a Muslim.
